scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.develop: rimraf build && ttab -g -t 'eil-test-helpers' -s "$BROWSER_SYNC_THEME" eval "$(npm bin)/gulp develop"
scripts.test_: npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.test:unit_: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha --full-trace --timeout 15000 --slow 75 --reporter spec --retries 2 --compilers js:babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill 'src/**/*.spec.js'
